sourcesContent:
import { AddIcon, AttachmentIcon, PhoneIcon, PlusSquareIcon } from "@chakra-ui/icons";
import {
	Box,
	Button,
	CloseButton,
	Heading,
	HStack,
	Text,
	Input,
	Image,
	Modal,
	ModalBody,
	ModalOverlay,
	ModalContent,
	VStack,
	Badge,
	RadioGroup,
	Stack,
	Radio,
	Checkbox,
	Textarea,
	useDisclosure,
	ModalHeader,
	ModalCloseButton,
	ModalFooter,
	InputGroup,
	InputLeftElement,
	InputRightElement,
	Tag,
	Avatar,
	TagLabel,
	IconButton
} from "@chakra-ui/react";





import { useState } from "react";
import { newMenuItem } from "../../scripts/newMenuItem";
import { DietTags, getDietData } from "../menu/dietTags";

export const NewMenuItem = () => {
	const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
	const [menuItem, setMenuItem] = useState("")
	const [tags, setTags] = useState(["vegan"])

	const handleSubmit = async () => {
		const itemObj = JSON.parse(menuItem)
		console.log(itemObj)
		const response = await newMenuItem(itemObj)
	}

	const handleChange = (event) => {
		setMenuItem(event.target.value)
	}


	const NewVariant = () => (
		<Stack spacing={4}>
			<InputGroup>
				<InputLeftElement
					pointerEvents='none'
					children={<PhoneIcon color='gray.300' />}
				/>
				<Input type='tel' placeholder='Phone number' />
			</InputGroup>

			<InputGroup>
				<InputLeftElement
					pointerEvents='none'
					color='gray.300'
					fontSize='1.2em'
					children='$'
				/>
				<Input placeholder='Enter amount' />
			</InputGroup>
		</Stack>
	)

	const DietTagsEdit = (props) => {
		const removeTag = tagName => {
			setTags(tags.filter(tag => tag == tagName))
		}

		return (
			<Box border={"1px solid gray"}>
				<Heading size="md"> Etiquetas  </Heading>
				{props.tags.map((tag) => {
					const { imgURL, name } = getDietData(tag);
	
					const remove = () => {removeTag(name)}
	
					return (
						<Tag size="lg" borderRadius="full" m="1">
							<Avatar src={imgURL} size="xs" name={name} ml={-1} mr={2} />
							<TagLabel>{name}</TagLabel>
							<CloseButton onClick={remove} />
						</Tag>
					);
				})}

				<IconButton icon={<AddIcon />} />
			</Box>
		)
	};

	return (
		<>
			<Button
				size='md'
				height='48px'
				width='200px'
				border='2px'
				borderColor='green.500' onClick={onOpen}>Añadir Nuevo Plato</Button>



			<Modal isOpen={isOpen} onClose={onClose}>
				<ModalOverlay />
				<ModalContent>
					<ModalHeader>Nuevo Plato</ModalHeader>
					<ModalCloseButton />
					<ModalBody>


						<VStack gap={10} >
							<Button style={{ borderRadius: 10, width: "100%", height: 100 }} rightIcon={<AttachmentIcon />
							} >
								Elegir una imagen
							</Button>
							<Stack spacing="5" w="100%" p="5">
								<Heading size="lg">{"name"}</Heading>

								<Input placeholder='Nombre del Item del Menú' size='lg' />

								<Textarea placeholder="Descripción" />

								<NewVariant />


								<DietTagsEdit tags={tags} />
								<Button> Añadir otra etiqueta</Button>





							</Stack>

						</VStack>

					</ModalBody>

					<ModalFooter>
						<Button mr={3} onClick={onClose}>
							Close
						</Button>
						<Button colorScheme='blue' onClick={handleSubmit} >
							Enviar
						</Button>
					</ModalFooter>
				</ModalContent>
			</Modal>
		</>
	)

}
